physical_appearance:This is a beaded pillow cover. It is rectangular in shape. It is decorated with colourful scrolling geometric patterns
 and stylized depictions of figures
 animals
 trees
 and flowers in the center panels. The entire pillow cover is made of beaded embroidery work.

metadata.physical_appearance: This is a beaded pillow cover. It is rectangular in shape. It is decorated with colourful scrolling geometric patterns, and stylized depictions of figures, animals, trees, and flowers in the center panels. The entire pillow cover is made of beaded embroidery work.
